title: Bullseye
overview: The programme will follow the original format with the playing teams made up of an amateur dart player, known as the ‘thrower', and their team partner, the ‘knower'. They will combine their skills, throwing darts at different game boards, whilst answering questions correctly for ‘points and prizes'. This brand new series, produced by ITV Studios, will also see professional darts players taking to the oche to help along the contestants and the return of Master of Ceremonies Richard Ashdown.
